product_name: Roxy Criss Cross Tankini Swimsuit - Girls'
long_description: The mega-bright girls' Roxy Criss Cross Tankini Swimsuit features a digitally enhanced print that's electrifyingly cute. Tankini top features crisscross ties at the back for a sporty fit; matching bottoms offer a high waistband and full coverage. Made from an extra-strong and incredibly resilient nylon/spandex blend, this super swim fabric is smooth to the touch and will help protect her skin from rashing. You can count on the Roxy Criss Cross Tankini Swimsuit colors to stay nice and bright even after several seasons in the surf and sun. Hand wash cold.
short_description: The mega-bright girls' Roxy Criss Cross Tankini Swimsuit features a digitally enhanced print that's electrifyingly cute.
